text: Nelson Xavier (30 August 1941 – 10 May 2017) was a Brazilian actor and director. He appeared in more than 95 movies and television shows between 1959 and 2017. He starred in the 1964 movie Os Fuzis. In 1976 Xavier co-directed A Queda along with Ruy Guerra. It was entered into the 28th Berlin International Film Festival, where it won the Silver Bear – Special Jury Prize. His last movie was Trash (2014). Xavier died on 10 May 2017 in Uberlândia, Minas Gerais from lung disease, aged 75. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1941 births Category:2017 deaths Category:Brazilian movie actors Category:Brazilian movie directors Category:Brazilian television actors Category:Actors from São Paulo
